resources.string: Come up with something for everyone to draw and choose its category. At the end of this phase, one word will be chosen at random.

Vel nihil iure saepe voluptas. Non consequatur reiciendis sunt quod sapiente architecto cumque vel. Assumenda veniam impedit qui deleniti totam quia. Aut ut consequuntur dignissimos. Officiis quia amet voluptatem amet illo.
